name: Balloon Bonanza
description:
You are above a party with water balloons. What else are you going to do?

Made for the BP8 Game Jam! This was everyone's first game jam in this project.

Controls:
  • Move: A and D
  • Stand under the hose bib to auto fill your balloon
  • Drop Balloon: Space
  • Hit the targets before time runs out to win
  • Hit non targets to reduce time
  • DON'T HIT THE BUTLERS

There is a bug that you may lose the game right when it loads :(. Just press retry!
